fields.description: A System Administrator in the application with User Management and Roles and Permissions access.
fields.name: Admin

fields.description: A regular government user in the system.
fields.name: GovUser

fields.description: A government user with authorization to Approve Credit Transfers.
fields.name: GovDirector

fields.description: A Fuel Supplier user with limited abilities to take actions.
fields.name: FSUser

fields.description: A Fuel Supplier user with authority to act on behalf of the Fuel Supplier on Credit Transfers.
fields.name: FSManager

fields.description: A Fuel Supplier admin user with authority to add and remove organizational users.
fields.name: FSAdmin

fields.description: A Fuel Supplier user defined in the system, but with no access to system functionality.
fields.name: FSNoAccess
